A new study has just been released by a group of scientists that shows a link between drinking coffee and a decrease in risk of developing type 2 diabetes. The study found that coffee drinkers had a 15% lower risk of developing the condition than non-coffee drinkers, even after controlling for other factors like age, gender, and lifestyle.
